scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:ai-engine" "npm run dev:emotions" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.setup: npm run setup:venv:gateway && npm run setup:venv:ai-engine && npm run setup:venv:emotions && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.setup:venv:gateway: cd backend/api-gateway && python -m venv .venv && .venv\Scripts\python -m pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup:venv:ai-engine: cd backend/ai-engine && python -m venv .venv && .venv\Scripts\python -m pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup:venv:emotions: cd backend/emotions-service && python -m venv .venv && .venv\Scripts\python -m pip install -r requirements.txt
